Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled benefits. Given its unique features and quality, I believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection. I am extending this opportunity to you with a special offer of $900000. This price reflects my confidence in the product's value and my desire to ensure you have the chance to experience its excellence. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can bring this remarkable product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $900,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $900,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
